tool_description: Search cities, countries and administrative divisions by name, autocompletion or IP.
name: Spott
title: Spott

api_list.name: Autocomplete places
api_list.description: Returns a list of places matching a prefix and specified filter properties. Useful to create "search as you type" inputs.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used together with \"skip\" to paginate results. Defaults to 10, maximum is 100.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Amount of places to ignore before beginning to return results. Used together with \"limit\" to paginate results. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is not available, \"localizedName\" property will be null.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their country \"id\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas (Ex. ?country=US,CA,MX).

optional_parameters.name: adminDivision1
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their adminDivision1 \"id\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas (Ex. ?country=US.CA,US.DE).

optional_parameters.name: accuracyRadiusKm
optional_parameters.description: Maximum radius from the point specified by \"latitude\" and \"longitude\" to filter places located within the area. The value must be expressed in Kilometers. Defaults to 100km.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: Latitude component of a coordinates set to filter places by their location. This parameter is ignored if \"longitude\" is not specified.

optional_parameters.name: adminDivision2
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 \"id\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Query string to find places which name starts with this prefix.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: Longitude component of a coordinates set to filter places by their location. This parameter is ignored if \"latitude\" is not specified.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their \"type\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas. Valid types are CITY, ADMIN_DIVISION_1, ADMIN_DIVISION_2 and COUNTRY.

api_list.name: Search places
api_list.description: Returns a list of places (either countries, cities or administrative divisions) matching a query and filtered by properties.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by \"type\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas. Valid types are CITY, ADMIN_DIVISION_1, ADMIN_DIVISION_2 and COUNTRY.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is not available, "localizedName" property will be null.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Amount of places to ignore before beginning to return results. Used together with \"limit\" to paginate results. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their country \"id\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas (Ex. ?country=US,CA,MX).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used together with \"skip\" to paginate results. Defaults to 10, maximum is 100.

optional_parameters.name: adminDivision1
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their adminDivision1 \"id\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas (Ex. ?country=US.CA,US.DE).

optional_parameters.name: adminDivision2
optional_parameters.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 \"id\". It's possible to specify multiple values separating them with commas.

optional_parameters.name: accuracyRadiusKm
optional_parameters.description: Maximum radius from the point specified by \"latitude\" and \"longitude\" to filter places located within the area. The value must be expressed in Kilometers. Defaults to 100km.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: Latitude component of a coordinates set to filter places by their location. This parameter is ignored if \"longitude\" is not specified.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Query string to find places with a similar name.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: Longitude component of a coordinates set to filter places by their location. This parameter is ignored if \"latitude\" is not specified.

api_list.name: Get place by IP
api_list.description: Returns the Place where a given IP Address is located. Returns "Not Found" error when no place is related to the IP. When sending '127.0.0.1' or '0.0.0.0' IP Addresses it will return the Place from the request was performed.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: IP Address (v4 and v6 are supported).

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is not available, "localizedName" property will be null.

api_list.name: Get place by my IP
api_list.description: Returns the place related to the IP where the request was performed. Returns "Not Found" error when no place is related to the IP.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is not available, "localizedName" property will be null.

api_list.name: Get place by ID
api_list.description: Returns a single Place identified by an ID.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is not available, "localizedName" property will be null.

api_list.name: Get place by Geoname ID
api_list.description: Returns a single Place identified by a Geoname ID.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is not available, \"localizedName\" property will be null.
